Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: duck beak
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The flat beak of a duck.

values.description: A flat beak has grown out of [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a duck. They may quack about bread or ponds. Eating is a little tricky when you have to peck.
A flat beak has grown out of [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a duck.
A flat beak has grown out of [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a duck. Somehow, this doesn't affect their speech.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A smooth plume of tailfeathers extends out of the back of [PAWN_nameDef]. Light reflects off them with subtle patterns.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: duck tailfeathers
